BoxInterface.name: root
BoxInterface.tooltip: Root box of Choregraphe's project. Highest level possible.

Input.name: onLoad
Input.tooltip: Signal sent when diagram is loaded.

Input.name: onStart
Input.tooltip: Box behavior starts when a signal is received on this input.

Input.name: onStop
Input.tooltip: Box behavior stops when a signal is received on this input.

Output.name: onStopped
Output.tooltip: Signal sent when box behavior is finished.

Parameter.name: File name
Parameter.tooltip: Name of the file you want to play.

Parameter.name: Begin position (s)
Parameter.tooltip: Position in seconds where the playing must start.
